venue.address_1: Quincy Marketplace in historic Faneuil Hall
venue.name: Dick's Last Resort

item.description: Uh oh...Thelma and Louise are bored again. . So we're going to Dick's Last Resort in Faneuil Hall. It's a really fun (and a little bit fresh) place where the staff makes fun of the patrons and make funny paper hats for us. Anyone else interested in being verbally abused while enjoying some apps. and a beer? Guaranteed to make you laugh. There's no cover charge either! Take the T to Haymarket and it's only a couple of blocks away.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for "meetup" or look for the balloon!
item.why: ...because you don't have anything better to do...

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Thelma and Louise are bored again!
